prompt: Create a vibrant product categories page with a gradient background transitioning from light purple to pink. Design a centered app bar with 'Shop Categories' in white text with a subtle shadow. Implement a 3-column grid layout for 6 product categories, each displayed in colorful rounded cards with different accent colors. Electronics should have an orange card, Audio in green, Computers in blue, Fashion in pink, Books in purple, and Home in teal. Each card should contain a white icon and white category name with a semi-transparent overlay effect. Add floating animation effects and ensure the cards have different colored shadows matching their themes.
